      },
      "659e9dc3-35ec-4371-8ee4-8a38d22386f9": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550456310539,
          "id": "659e9dc3-35ec-4371-8ee4-8a38d22386f9",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550456310539,
          "parent_id": "8b5b44c4-4a2d-462b-9128-bef2b79739ec",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "public class Game extends SurfaceView implements SurfaceHolder.Callback, Runnable{\n\n    /**\n     * Holds the surface frame\n     */\n    private SurfaceHolder holder;\n\n    /**\n     * Draw thread\n     */\n    private Thread drawThread;\n\n    /**\n     * True when the surface is ready to draw\n     */\n    private boolean surfaceReady = false;\n\n\n    /**\n     * Drawing thread flag\n     */\n\n    private boolean drawingActive = false;\n\n    /**\n     * Time per frame for 60 FPS\n     */\n    private static final int MAX_FRAME_TIME = (int) (1000.0 / 60.0);\n\n    private static final String LOGTAG = \"surface\";    \n\n    /*\n     * All the constructors are overridden to ensure functionality if one of the different constructors are used through an XML file or programmatically\n     */\n    public Game(Context context) {\n        super(context);\n        init();\n    }\n    public Game(Context context, AttributeSet attrs) {\n        super(context, attrs);\n        init();\n    }\n    public Game(Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr) {\n        super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr);\n        init();\n    }\n    @TargetApi(21)\n    public Game(Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr, int defStyleRes) {\n        super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr, defStyleRes);\n        init();\n    }\n\n    public void init(Context c) {\n        this.c = c;\n        \n        SurfaceHolder holder = getHolder();\n        holder.addCallback(this);\n        setFocusable(true);\n        //Initialize other stuff here later\n    }\n\n    public void render(Canvas c){\n        //Game rendering here\n    }\n\n    public void tick(){\n        //Game logic here\n    }\n\n    @Override\n    public void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder, int format, int width, int height)\n    {\n        if (width == 0 || height == 0){\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // resize your UI\n    }\n\n    @Override\n    public void surfaceCreated(SurfaceHolder holder){\n        this.holder = holder;\n\n        if (drawThread != null){\n            Log.d(LOGTAG, \"draw thread still active..\");\n            drawingActive = false;\n            try{\n                drawThread.join();\n            } catch (InterruptedException e){}\n        }\n\n        surfaceReady = true;\n        startDrawThread();\n        Log.d(LOGTAG, \"Created\");\n    }\n\n    @Override\n    public void surfaceDestroyed(SurfaceHolder holder){\n        // Surface is not used anymore - stop the drawing thread\n        stopDrawThread();\n        // and release the surface\n        holder.getSurface().release();\n\n        this.holder = null;\n        surfaceReady = false;\n        Log.d(LOGTAG, \"Destroyed\");\n    }\n\n    @Override\n    public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event){\n        // Handle touch events\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Stops the drawing thread\n     */\n    public void stopDrawThread(){\n        if (drawThread == null){\n            Log.d(LOGTAG, \"DrawThread is null\");\n            return;\n        }\n        drawingActive = false;\n        while (true){\n            try{\n                Log.d(LOGTAG, \"Request last frame\");\n                drawThread.join(5000);\n                break;\n            } catch (Exception e) {\n                Log.e(LOGTAG, \"Could not join with draw thread\");\n            }\n        }\n        drawThread = null;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Creates a new draw thread and starts it.\n     */\n    public void startDrawThread(){\n        if (surfaceReady && drawThread == null){\n            drawThread = new Thread(this, \"Draw thread\");\n            drawingActive = true;\n            drawThread.start();\n        }\n    }\n\n    @Override\n    public void run() {\n        Log.d(LOGTAG, \"Draw thread started\");\n        long frameStartTime;\n        long frameTime;\n\n        /*\n         * In order to work reliable on Nexus 7, we place ~500ms delay at the start of drawing thread\n         * (AOSP - Issue 58385)\n         */\n        if (android.os.Build.BRAND.equalsIgnoreCase(\"google\") && android.os.Build.MANUFACTURER.equalsIgnoreCase(\"asus\") && android.os.Build.MODEL.equalsIgnoreCase(\"Nexus 7\")) {\n            Log.w(LOGTAG, \"Sleep 500ms (Device: Asus Nexus 7)\");\n            try {\n                Thread.sleep(500);\n            } catch (InterruptedException ignored) {}\n        }\n\n        while (drawing) {\n            if (sf == null) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            frameStartTime = System.nanoTime();\n            Canvas canvas = sf.lockCanvas();\n            if (canvas != null) {\n                try {\n                    synchronized (sf) {\n                        tick();\n                        render(canvas);\n                    }\n                } finally {\n\n                    sf.unlockCanvasAndPost(canvas);\n                }\n            }\n\n            // calculate the time required to draw the frame in ms\n            frameTime = (System.nanoTime() - frameStartTime) / 1000000;\n\n            if (frameTime < MAX_FRAME_TIME){\n                try {\n                    Thread.sleep(MAX_FRAME_TIME - frameTime);\n                } catch (InterruptedException e) {\n                    // ignore\n                }\n            }\n\n        }\n        Log.d(LOGTAG, \"Draw thread finished\");\n    }\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
